options.optionText: Uh... I can see... a lot.
options.responseText: Oh, this? Yeah, figured I’d give the girls a little air. What’s the matter? Feeling a bit *distracted*?

followUpOptions.optionText: You’re seriously playing with fire here.
followUpOptions.responseText: I’ve been walking around this vault with half my suit unzipped for days. Nobody’s gonna do anything.
